info.title: Matching Cards
info.author: teknecal
info.details:
Pair up all the cards before the time runs out to proceed to the next level.
There are 3 difficulties (easy, normal, hard) and 7 levels.
		
Uses the Wiimote Controller with IR.

A Button = Select card
Plus Button = Return to menu
Home Button = Return to loader

If you need to correct your IR cursor in the game, use:
Up Button = Y - 25
Down Button = Y + 25
Left Button = X - 50
Right Button = X + 50
